doc.title: Ofelia
doc.plot: While sleeping, Ofelia, is visited by an old man that lives in an enchanted forest inside her wardrobe. The old man takes Ofelia in his arms and carries her through the wardrobe into his world where he plants her into the ground. Ofelia then grows up into a beautiful tree that the old man cares for until it's time to harvest. During the harvest time the old man collects the apples, that are Ofelia's babies, and proceeds to eat them. Ofelia is then left alone and isolated.
